item.title: 当米歇尔-阿维拉（Michelle Avila）和安东尼奥-莫雷诺（Antonio Moreno）去领结婚证时，他们知道他们希望父母能参加他们的婚礼。
item.description:
When Michelle Avila and Antonio Moreno went to get their marriage license, they knew they wanted their parents to attend their nuptials.

They started asking hospital staffers if it would be possible for them to get married at the hospital.https://t.co/pSYSJWWoMQ pic.twitter.com/I9hLFNrcNi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统周二在战场内华达州和亚利桑那州进行了竞选活动，他在活动中大肆宣扬其政府取得的成就，并与他的竞选团队所称的 "特朗普的反拉美裔议程 "形成鲜明对比。
item.description:
Pres. Biden made a campaign swing through battlegrounds Nevada and Arizona on Tuesday in which he touted his administration's accomplishments and drew contrasts with what his campaign calls "Trump's anti-Latino agenda." https://t.co/i80VUxY59w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在荷兰郁金香花田春意盎然之际，一个人工智能机器人成为根除花田病害的新型高科技武器。
item.description:
An AI robot is a new high-tech weapon in the battle to root out disease from Dutch tulip fields as they erupt into a riot of springtime color. https://t.co/Y9ZtHULUhO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 特朗普反击纽约封口费案申请动议限制。
item.description:
Trump pushes back against restriction on filing motions in New York hush money case. https://t.co/tFTxnhkkzO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 阿丽亚娜-格兰德（Ariana Grande）的祖母正在《公告牌》排行榜上创造历史。98 岁的玛乔丽-格兰德（Marjorie Grande），又名 "Nonna"，由于在孙女的新歌《平凡的事》（"ordinary things"）中演唱，成为《公告牌》Hot 100 排行榜上最年长的人。
item.description:
Ariana Grande's grandmother is making history on the Billboard charts.

At 98, Marjorie Grande, aka "Nonna," has become the oldest person to appear on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, thanks to her feature on her granddaughter's new song, "ordinary things." https://t.co/x6pdbig35I pic.twitter.com/o3YMbi9Tin

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的医疗服务提供商之一联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）首席执行官本周早些时候表示，该公司正在从美国历史上最严重的医疗系统网络攻击事件中恢复过来，并取得了进展。
item.description:
The UnitedHealth Group — one of the nation’s largest health care providers — said it is making progress in its recovery from one of the worst cyberattacks on a health care system in U.S. history, its CEO said earlier this week.https://t.co/1umtj0N4Y1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据投票分析预测，商人伯尼-莫雷诺（Bernie Moreno）将赢得俄亥俄州共和党参议院初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Businessman Bernie Moreno will win the GOP Senate primary in Ohio, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the vote. https://t.co/Rxy0RI6J3r pic.twitter.com/QTbRcnJ92O

item.title: 周二，梅拉尼娅-特朗普（Melania Trump）与前总统特朗普一起来到棕榈滩的一个投票站--这是她在本选举周期内罕见的公开露面。当被问及她是否会与丈夫一起参加竞选活动时，这位前第一夫人微笑着说："敬请期待。
item.description:
Melania Trump joined former Pres. Trump at a polling place in Palm Beach on Tuesday — making a rare public appearance this election cycle.

Asked if she'd be joining her husband on the campaign trail, the former first lady smiled and said, "stay tuned." https://t.co/33hPE0w9U3 pic.twitter.com/w2anWg4jGm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 娜塔莎-理查森（Natasha Richardson）的儿子在母亲因滑雪事故不幸去世 15 年后缅怀她。
item.description:

item.title: 根据《英国医学杂志》上的一项新研究，研究人员发现，接种 COVID-19 疫苗还能带来一系列其他积极的健康益处。
item.description:
Researchers have discovered that having a COVID-19 vaccination came with a slew of other positive health benefits, according to a new study in the British Medical Journal. https://t.co/7dIWa1kNaL

item.title: 春季快乐！美国东部时间 3 月 19 日星期二晚上 11:06 分，春天正式到来。来看看世界各地的春花吧。
item.description:
Happy spring!

Spring officially arrives at 11:06 p.m. EDT on Tuesday, March 19. Take a peek at spring blooms from around the world. https://t.co/UEn8WBSVm3 pic.twitter.com/xL3mUbiA93

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）选择公布其人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 背后的代码，从而颠覆了这场争论：
item.description:
Some of the world’s largest companies are fighting over a question that will help shape the future of AI: Should firms reveal how their products work?

Elon Musk has upended the debate by opting to release the code behind his AI chatbot, Grok.

Learn more: https://t.co/v15WGmzZ32

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最近，一种被称为 "鲸龙 "的重甲古鳄鱼祖先物种的化石被鉴定出来，让我们得以一窥 2.15 亿年前的世界。
item.description:
The recent identification of fossils from a heavily armored ancient crocodile ancestor species, known as aetosaurs, provides a glimpse into our world 215 million years ago. https://t.co/SLdrsxgpnw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 特朗普称他可能被迫以 "火卖价格 "出售资产，以支付民事欺诈案中的 4.64 亿美元保证金。
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 在周二晚上的开奖之前，"兆彩 "头奖奖金已飙升至 8.93 亿美元，是 "兆彩 "历史上第六大头奖。根据 Mega Millions 的数据，中大奖的几率为 1/302,575,350。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot has surged to $893 million ahead of Tuesday night's drawing.

The total is the sixth-largest in Mega Millions history. The odds of winning the jackpot are 1 in 302,575,350, according to Mega Millions. https://t.co/AafHOh6Wnd pic.twitter.com/qvKnr0zqLw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局局长克里斯托弗-雷（Christopher Wray）表示，联邦调查局正竭尽全力为被非法入境移民杀害的大学生莱肯-莱利（Laken Riley）讨回 "公道"。
item.description:
The FBI is doing everything it can to get "justice" for Laken Riley, the college student who was murdered by a migrant in the country illegally, FBI Director Christopher Wray said. https://t.co/LBbevqx0Yv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据当地执法部门称，密歇根州众议员丹-基尔迪（Dan Kildee）的兄弟蒂姆-基尔迪（Tim Kildee）于周二清晨在密歇根州基尼西县（Genesee County）的一起枪击案中丧生。
item.description:

item.title: 当局称，一辆卡车在加利福尼亚州加油站行驶时，一名无人照看的 3 岁儿童坐在方向盘后，该车致命地撞倒了一名 2 岁女童。

An unattended 3-year-old child was behind the wheel of a truck left running at a California gas station when the vehicle fatally struck a 2-year-old girl, authorities said. https://t.co/qqlExAwuoC pic.twitter.com/9f8cZ9AE0G

item.title: 密西西比州前治安官亨特-埃尔沃德（Hunter Elward）因 2023 年 1 月对两名黑人实施酷刑而认罪，周二在联邦法院被判处约 20 年监禁。

item.title: 组织者说，反拜登 "未承诺 "运动在几个州的初选中取得相对成功后，计划在今年秋天的大选中继续向总统施压。
item.description:
The anti-Biden "uncommitted" movement plans to continue pressuring the president through the general election this fall after seeing relative success in a few state primaries, organizers said. https://t.co/FzMxlUcWo0
